tasks.name: Daily System Health Report
tasks.description: Daily health check of system resources and running services
tasks.prompt: Perform a comprehensive system health check. Check CPU, memory, disk usage, active processes, and any critical logs. Provide a summary report.

tasks.name: Hourly Resource Monitor
tasks.description: Check system resources every hour and alert if thresholds exceeded
tasks.prompt: Check current RAM and disk usage. If either exceeds their critical thresholds, provide optimization recommendations.

tasks.name: Weekly Process Optimization
tasks.prompt: List the top 10 processes consuming the most CPU and memory. Analyze their necessity and suggest which ones could be optimized or stopped.

tasks.name: Log Rotation and Cleanup
tasks.description: Check and manage log files to prevent disk space issues
tasks.prompt: Analyze the Ollash log file for errors and warnings from the past week. Generate a summary of the most critical issues.

tasks.name: Disk Usage Alert
tasks.description: Continuous monitoring for disk space critical levels
tasks.prompt: If disk space is critically low (< 15% free), provide immediate recommendations for freeing space.

tasks.name: Memory Pressure Alert
tasks.description: Alert when system memory usage is critically high
tasks.prompt: If available memory is below 10%, identify memory-heavy processes and suggest optimizations.

tasks.name: Performance Baseline Report

schedule.human_readable: First day of every month at 8:00 AM

tasks.prompt: Generate a comprehensive performance baseline report including CPU speed, memory capacity, disk speed, network latency, and compare with historical data.
